definition: face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc
lit. not to know the true face of Lushan Mountain/fig. can't see the forest for the trees
pinyin: bu4 shi4 Lu2 shan1 zhen1 mian4 mu4

sentences.english: Just read Leeao's book " The True Face of Chen Shui Bian" you will be enlightened.
sentences.chinese: 不妨讀讀李敖的《陳水扁真面目》，你將會茅塞頓開。

sentences.english: and you may have even guessed that it's the real face behind Design, LLC.
sentences.chinese: 你甚至可能猜到設計有限責任公司背後的真面目。

sentences.english: So I figured I would draw Kakashi's face.
sentences.chinese: 所以我認爲我應該畫出卡卡西的真面目。

sentences.english: Fortune does not change men, it unmasks them.
sentences.chinese: 財富不會改變人，而是揭露人的真面目。

sentences.english: And yet Hobbes is a great debunker of human pride.
sentences.chinese: 但霍布斯揭穿了人類傲驕的真面目。

sentences.english: As nazism took hold of Germany, however, he saw nazism for what it was.
sentences.chinese: 但當納粹黨在德國當政後，他看清了納粹的真面目。

sentences.english: It lives in the flesh or your attachment to the body.
sentences.chinese: 它還是你生活的廬山真面目掛職屍體。

sentences.english: So that should tell you something about low fat diets.
sentences.chinese: 所以你應該認識到這些低脂食品的真面目了。

sentences.english: “At least candy is honest about what it is, ” she said.
sentences.chinese: “起碼糖果夠誠實，從不掩蓋自己的真面目，”她說。

sentences.english: It was strange that no one pricked the bubble.
sentences.chinese: 奇怪的是沒有一個人來揭破真面目。

sentences.english: Their slanders only serve to lay bare their own true features.
sentences.chinese: 他們的誹謗只能充分暴露他們自己的真面目。

sentences.english: Here is displayed the true spirit of popery .
sentences.chinese: 教皇制度的廬山真面目，於此可見一斑。

sentences.english: Spoil a purple dress gold to take, elementary had no several individuals to once see his true persona.
sentences.chinese: 慣着紫衣金帶，基本沒幾個人見過他的真面目。

sentences.english: The aftermath of Cablegate led to the first publicly viewable infowar.
sentences.chinese: 密電門的餘波讓首次讓公衆一窺信息戰的真面目。

definition: inside information/the ins and outs of the matter/how things stand/what's up
lit. fox's tail (idiom); visible sign of evil intentions/to reveal one's evil nature/evidence that reveals the villain
